original_text: And Joash slept with his fathers; and Jeroboam sat upon his throne: and Joash was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel.
korean_text: 요아스가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 이스라엘 왕들과 함께 사마리아에 장사되고 여로보암이 그 자리에 앉으니라

sentences.original_text: And Joash slept with his fathers
and Jeroboam sat upon his throne
and Joash was buried in Samaria
